head.title: Dec. 26 - Jan. 1; China Sentences 4 Members Of Spiritual Group

hedline.hl1: Dec. 26 - Jan. 1; China Sentences 4 Members Of Spiritual Group

block.p: Sending a harsh message to followers of the Falun Gong spiritual movement, Chinese authorities gave prison sentences ranging from 7 to 18 years to three men and a woman who were said to be top organizers. Last summer the government declared the group an ''evil cult'' after 10,000 members mounted an illegal demonstration in Beijing.

Two of the sentences -- 18 years for one defendant and 16 years for another -- were stiffer than those meted out to democracy advocates in the last several years, a sign of how frightened the government is of a movement that has attracted millions of citizens.
